rooms.description: Spacious entrance with ample natural light from West-facing window, designed to welcome visitors and allow smooth flow into the courtyard.
Bohemian style living area with open layout adjacent to central courtyard for enhanced ventilation. Features large windows facing West to catch natural light.
Dining space adjoining the kitchen, optimized for morning sunlight and a view of the courtyard, adhering to Vastu principles regarding dining area placement.
Modern yet bohemian styled kitchen with an attached pantry. Designed to allow natural ventilation and light from the West.
Small, functional space for servant's quarters located near the entrance; includes a small wash area and storage.

openings.description: Main entrance door leading into entrance hall with adequate clearance for two-car garage access.
Garage entry providing access to a two-car garage area on the ground floor.
Multiple windows placed strategically for optimal natural light and cross ventilation, in line with Vastu principles.
Small balcony adjoining the living room to provide an outdoor space and enhance natural light penetration.

courtyard_details.description: Central open courtyard providing natural light and ventilation to adjoining rooms. Acts as a communal gathering space.

vastu_considerations: West-facing plot is optimal for energy flow and abundant morning sunlight.
Placing the living room, kitchen, and dining areas on West-facing walls aligns with Vastu principles for prosperity.
Central courtyard enhances natural ventilation and spiritual harmony.
